decks.notes: This deck aims to generate a large amount of mana and card advantage through the use of artifacts and spells like Paradoxical Outcome. By bouncing multiple artifacts back to hand and replaying them, the deck can draw into combo pieces like Time Vault and win the game quickly. It also includes disruption in the form of counterspells and removal spells to protect the combo and control the game. The inclusion of Lurrus of the Dream-Den as a companion allows for additional value and recursion from the graveyard.

The deck focuses on disruption and aggression by using efficient creatures like Collector Ouphe and Deathrite Shaman, along with disruptive spells like Force of Will and Flusterstorm. It also utilizes powerful planeswalkers such as Oko, Thief of Crowns and Leovold, Emissary of Trest to gain control of the game. The deck is able to maintain tempo and disrupt opponents' strategies with cards like Strip Mine, Wasteland, and Abrupt Decay. The inclusion of key combo pieces like Hullbreacher and Time Walk adds additional versatility to the deck's game plan.

The deck focuses on using hatebear creatures and disruptive artifacts to slow down the opponent while maintaining a steady stream of threats. Utilizing cards like Thalia, Guardian of Thraben and Archon of Emeria to tax the opponent's spells, as well as Anointed Peacekeeper to prevent attacks. The goal is to disrupt the opponent's game plan while deploying efficient creatures like Seasoned Dungeoneer and White Plume Adventurer to close out the game quickly. The deck also incorporates powerful mana acceleration like Black Lotus and Moxen to quickly establish board presence and pressure the opponent.

The main focus of this Vintage 1 vs 1 Combo - Dredge deck is to quickly fill the graveyard with cards like Creeping Chill, Golgari Grave-Troll, and Shambling Shell, enabling powerful plays with cards like Hollow One and Ichorid. The deck utilizes cards like Bazaar of Baghdad and Serum Powder to help dig through the deck and set up explosive combos. Force of Will, Force of Negation, Mental Misstep, and Mindbreak Trap provide protection against disruption from the opponent, allowing the deck to execute its game plan efficiently.

This deck focuses on disrupting your opponent's game plan with hate cards like Thalia, Guardian of Thraben and Archon of Emeria, while also being aggressive with creatures like Anointed Peacekeeper and White Plume Adventurer. It aims to slow down the opponent's strategy while applying pressure with efficient creatures and disruptive spells. The deck also includes mana acceleration with powerful artifacts like Black Lotus and Moxen, allowing for explosive starts. The combination of hatebears and aggro elements creates a versatile and proactive game plan in a Vintage 1 vs 1 format.

The deck focuses on utilizing the powerful card Underworld Breach to create a combo that allows for rapid casting of spells from the graveyard. By combining various fast mana sources like Moxen and Lotus, along with powerful card draw and tutor effects, the deck can quickly assemble the necessary pieces to win the game in a single turn. It also includes disruptive elements like Force of Will and Pyroblast to protect the combo, as well as cards like Hullbreacher and Dack Fayden for additional control and card advantage.

The deck focuses on utilizing the powerful combo potential of Underworld Breach to create loops with cards like Brain Freeze, Waterlogged Teachings, and Hullbreacher to generate card advantage and win the game through drawing and milling out opponents quickly. The deck also includes a variety of powerful Vintage staples like Ancestral Recall, Black Lotus, and Time Walk to support the combo strategy and provide additional ways to disrupt and control opponents. Overall, the deck aims to win the game quickly and decisively through its efficient and explosive combo potential.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly fill up the graveyard with Dredge creatures by using cards like Bazaar of Baghdad and Serum Powder. Once the graveyard is filled, the deck aims to bring back powerful creatures like Golgari Grave-Troll and Hollow One while gaining value from cards like Ichorid and Prized Amalgam. The deck also includes disruptive elements like Force of Will and Chalice of the Void to protect the combo and disrupt the opponent's game plan. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with its graveyard recursion and powerful creatures.

This deck aims to win quickly through a powerful combo using cards like Paradoxical Outcome, Time Vault, and Manifold Key. The deck includes strong control elements with cards like Force of Will and Swords to Plowshares to protect the combo pieces. It utilizes powerful mana acceleration with cards like Black Lotus and Moxen to quickly assemble the combo. The deck also includes card draw and tutor effects to find key pieces quickly. Overall, the deck focuses on a fast and efficient win condition through a powerful combo setup.

The deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's strategy with hatebears like Archon of Emeria and Chancellor of the Annex while applying aggressive pressure with creatures like Stillmoon Cavalier and White Plume Adventurer. It also includes powerful artifacts like Black Lotus and Moxen for ramp and mana acceleration. The deck aims to control the board with cards like Witch Enchanter and Anointed Peacekeeper, while utilizing cards like Seasoned Dungeoneer and March of Otherworldly Light for card advantage and staying ahead in the game. The deck's mana base also includes powerful lands like Cavern of Souls and Karakas for protection and utility.

The deck focuses on utilizing graveyard recursion and dredge mechanics to quickly and consistently fill the graveyard with key creatures like Stinkweed Imp and Golgari Thug, allowing for explosive combos with cards like Prized Amalgam and Creeping Chill. It aims to aggressively mill through the deck with cards like Bazaar of Baghdad and Shambling Shell while controlling the game with disruption cards like Force of Will and Force of Negation. The deck is designed to overwhelm opponents with fast and powerful graveyard synergies while utilizing counterspells and disruption to protect its game plan.

The key focus of this deck is to control the game using Oath of Druids to quickly put powerful creatures like Atraxa, Grand Unifier onto the battlefield. The deck also utilizes cards like Force of Will and Force of Negation to protect its strategy, while also having options like Show and Tell and Tinker to cheat out threats. The deck aims to disrupt the opponent's plans while setting up a strong board presence to ultimately dominate the game. It is a versatile and powerful control deck that can quickly turn the tides in its favor.

This deck focuses on utilizing the power of Underworld Breach to combo off and generate infinite mana, draw, and spells. The deck includes powerful cards like Black Lotus, Ancestral Recall, and Bolas's Citadel to fuel the combo. Additional cards like Hullbreacher, Force of Will, and Dack Fayden provide disruption and protection. The deck aims to assemble its combo pieces quickly and overwhelm the opponent with a flurry of spells and card advantage, leading to a decisive victory.

This deck relies on using Doomsday to set up a winning combo of Thassa's Oracle and Underground Sea. It includes powerful draw spells like Ancestral Recall and Demonic Tutor to find key pieces quickly. Protection spells like Force of Will and Flusterstorm help ensure the combo goes off smoothly, while cards like Ponder and Brainstorm help with card selection. The deck also has access to fast mana with Black Lotus and Moxen. Overall, the goal is to quickly assemble the combo and win the game before the opponent can respond.

The deck focuses on creating an infinite loop with Paradoxical Outcome by bouncing multiple artifacts back to hand for card draw and mana generation. It aims to generate a large amount of mana quickly using powerful mana sources like Mishra's Workshop and Grim Monolith, while also controlling the opponent's plays with counterspells like Force of Will. The combination of artifacts like The One Ring and Coveted Jewel, along with support cards like Tinker and Karn, the Great Creator, allows for fast and explosive plays to overwhelm the opponent.
